title: Shiz Gozi Zeus and Dridex
extract: Dridex also known as Bugat and Cridex is a form of malware that specializes in stealing bank credentials via a system that utilizes macros from Microsoft Word. ... The primary objective of this software is to steal banking information from users of infected machines to immediately launch fraudulent transactions.

The primary objective of this software is to steal banking information from users of infected machines to immediately launch fraudulent transactions.
